attributes.action: Encourage the UK public to buy British meat
attributes.additional_details: Encourage the British public to buy British meat for example to help British farmers,especially with the problems resulting from new export procedures.
attributes.background: Be more proactive promoting British products(especially farm produce)post brexit as the farmers and British manufacturers need all the help they can get in these trying times.We need to buy British.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for industry.
